import { Component, HostListener, OnInit } from '@angular/core';
import { Anime, Manga, User, StatusAnime, RatingAnime, StatusManga, RatingManga } from '../../interfaces';
import { UserService } from '../../services/user.service';
import { TokenService } from '../../services/token.service';
import { StatusService } from '../../services/status.service';
import { RatingService } from 'src/app/services/rating.service';
import { ModalserviceService } from '../../services/modalservice.service';
import Swal from 'sweetalert2';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-profile',
  templateUrl: './profile.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./profile.component.scss']
})
export class ProfileComponent implements OnInit {
  public user: User;
  p: number = 1;
  pManga: number = 1;
  public windowScrolled=false;
  public userId: string;
  public status: StatusAnime;
  public rating: RatingAnime;
  public statusManga: StatusManga;
  public ratingManga: RatingManga;
  public anime: Anime = {
    title: "",
    rating: 0,
    picture: "",
    status: "",
    animeSeason: { season: "", year: 0 },
    episodes: 0,
    synonyms: [],
    tags: [],
    type: ""
  };
  public manga: Manga = {
    alternativeTitles: [],
    genres: [],
    imageRemotePath: "",
    rating: 0,
    staff: [],
    title: "",

  }
  public animeList: Anime[] = [];
  public mangaList: Manga[] = [];

  constructor(private userService: UserService, private tokenService: TokenService, private statusService: StatusService, private ratingService: RatingService, private modalService: ModalserviceService) { }

  ngOnInit(): void {
    this.findUser();
  }

  @HostListener('window:scroll', [])
  onWindowScroll(): void {
    if (
      window.pageYOffset ||
      document.documentElement.scrollTop ||
      document.body.scrollTop > 100
    ) {
      this.windowScrolled = true;
    } else if (
      (this.windowScrolled && window.pageYOffset) ||
      document.documentElement.scrollTop ||
      document.body.scrollTop < 10
    ) {
      this.windowScrolled = false;
    }
  }

  scrollToTop(): void {
    (function smoothscroll() {
      var currentScroll =
        document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop;
      if (currentScroll > 0) {
        window.requestAnimationFrame(smoothscroll);
        window.scrollTo(0, currentScroll - currentScroll / 8);
      }
    })();
  }

  findUser() {
    this.userId = localStorage.getItem('user');
    this.userService.findUserById(this.userId).subscribe(res => {
      this.user = res.user;
      this.findAnimeList(this.user._id)
      this.findMangaList(this.user._id)
    });
  }

  logout() {
    this.tokenService.logout();
  }

  findAnimeList(id: string) {
    this.userService.findAnimeList(id).subscribe(res => {
      this.animeList = res.user.animeList;
      console.log(res.user.animeList)
    })
  }

  findMangaList(id: string) {
    this.userService.findMangaList(id).subscribe(res => {
      this.mangaList = res.user.mangaList;
      console.log(res.user.mangaList)
    })
  }

  initializeStatusAndRating() {
    this.status = {
      animeId: this.anime._id,
      userId: localStorage.getItem("user")
    }
    this.rating = {
      animeId: this.anime._id,
      userId: localStorage.getItem("user")
    }

    this.statusService.checkStatus(this.status).subscribe(resp => {
      if (resp.anime) {

        this.anime.statusUser = resp.anime.status
        this.ratingService.checkRating(this.rating).subscribe(resp => {
          if (resp.anime) {
            this.anime.ratingUser = resp.anime.rating
            this.modalService.openCloseModalAnime();
          } else {
            this.anime.ratingUser = 0;
            this.modalService.openCloseModalAnime();
          }
        })
      } else {
        this.anime.statusUser = ""
        this.ratingService.checkRating(this.rating).subscribe(resp => {
          if (resp.anime) {
            this.anime.ratingUser = resp.anime.rating
            this.modalService.openCloseModalAnime();

          } else {
            this.anime.ratingUser = 0;

            this.modalService.openCloseModalAnime();
          }
        })
      }

    }, err => {

    })
  }

  initializeStatusAndRatingManga() {
    this.statusManga = {
      mangaId: this.manga._id,
      userId: localStorage.getItem("user")
    }
    this.ratingManga = {
      mangaId: this.manga._id,
      userId: localStorage.getItem("user")
    }
    this.statusService.checkStatusManga(this.statusManga).subscribe(resp => {
      if (resp.manga) {
        this.manga.statusUser = resp.manga.status
        this.ratingService.checkRatingManga(this.ratingManga).subscribe(resp => {
          if (resp.manga) {
            this.manga.ratingUser = resp.manga.rating
            this.modalService.openCloseModalManga();
          } else {
            this.manga.ratingUser = 0;
            this.modalService.openCloseModalManga();
          }
        })
      } else {
        this.manga.statusUser = ""
        this.ratingService.checkRatingManga(this.ratingManga).subscribe(resp => {
          if (resp.manga) {
            this.manga.ratingUser = resp.manga.rating
            this.modalService.openCloseModalManga();
          } else {
            this.manga.ratingUser = 0;
            this.modalService.openCloseModalManga();
          }
        })
      }

    }, err => {

    })
    //this.statusDB = document.getElementById("selectStatus") as HTMLSelectElement;
  }

  editAnime(anime?: Anime) {
    console.log(anime);
    if (this.user) {

      this.anime = { ...anime }
      this.initializeStatusAndRating();
    }
  }

  editManga(manga?: Manga) {
    console.log(manga);
    this.manga = { ...manga }
    this.initializeStatusAndRatingManga();
  }

  editUsername(id:string){
    Swal.fire({
      title: 'Change your username!',
      html: `<input type="text" id="username" minlength="6" maxlength="10" class="swal2-input" placeholder="New Username">`,
      confirmButtonText: 'Change it!',
      showCancelButton: true,
      cancelButtonText: "Cancel",
      focusConfirm: false,

    }).then((isConfirm) => {
      if (isConfirm.isConfirmed) {

        const firstMessage = Swal.getPopup().querySelector('#username') as HTMLInputElement
        const newUsername = firstMessage.value;
        if (newUsername.trim() == "" || newUsername.length<6) {
          Swal.fire('Username is required and must be between 6 and 10 characters long.').then(() => {
            this.editUsername(id);
          })
        } else {
          this.userService.editUsername(id,newUsername).subscribe(() => {
            Swal.DismissReason;
            this.findUser();
          });
        }


      }

    })
  }
}

<html>
<div>
    <app-animemodal [anime]="anime" (modalClose)="editAnime()"> </app-animemodal>
    <app-mangamodal [manga]="manga" (modalClose)="editManga()"> </app-mangamodal>
    <div class="d-none d-md-block d-sm-none">
        <app-nav></app-nav>
    </div>
    <div class="container my-3">
    <div class="row cont">
      <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="vl my-3">
          <div class="d-flex justify-content-center">
            <div class="brand_logo_container">
              <img src="../../../assets/axolotl.png" class="brand_logo" alt="Logo">
            </div>
            
          </div>
          <div class="container d-flex justify-content-center">
            <h4 *ngIf="user" class="card-title my-3">{{user.username}}'s profile <small><i class="fas fa-pen" (click)="editUsername(user._id)"></i></small></h4>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="col-md-9">
        <div class="row">
          <div class="col-md-6">
            <div class="container list" *ngIf="animeList.length>0">
              <h1 class="tit">Anime List</h1>
              <div class="card mb-3 fondo" style="max-width: auto;" *ngFor="let anime of animeList | paginate: { itemsPerPage: 6, currentPage: p } " (click)="editAnime(anime)">
                  <div class="row no-gutters series">
                    <div class="col-md-3">
                      <img src="{{anime.picture | noImage}}" class="card-img img-thumbnail" alt="...">
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-9">
                      <div class="card-body">
                        <h4 class="card-title">{{anime.title}}<small class="icon">  {{anime.rating | number:'.1-1'}}<i class="fas fa-star"></i></small></h4>
                        <p class="card-text season">{{anime.animeSeason.season | noSeason }} | {{anime.animeSeason.year | noYear}}</p>
                        <p class="card-text ep">{{anime.episodes}} episodes</p>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              <pagination-controls class="pagination" (pageChange)="p = $event"></pagination-controls>
          </div>
          </div>
          <div class="col-md-6">
            <div class="container list" *ngIf="mangaList.length>0">
              <h1 class="tit">Manga List</h1>
              <div class="card mb-3 fondo" style="max-width: auto;" *ngFor="let manga of mangaList | paginate: { itemsPerPage: 6, currentPage: p }"
              (click)="editManga(manga)">
                <div class="row no-gutters" >
                    <div class="col-md-3">
                        <img src="{{manga.imageRemotePath | noImage}}" class="card-img img-thumbnail" alt="...">
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-9">
                        <div class="card-body">
                            <h5 class="card-title">{{manga.title}} <small class="icon">  {{manga.rating | number:'.1-1'}}<i class="fas fa-star"></i></small></h5>
                            <p class="card-text ep">{{manga.plotSummary | noDescription}}</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <br>
                </div>
            </div>
                <pagination-controls class="pagination" (pageChange)="pManga = $event"></pagination-controls>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <button class="btn-float btn-float__top" [ngClass]="{ 'show-scrollTop': windowScrolled }" *ngIf="windowScrolled"
    (click)="scrollToTop()">
    <i class="fas fa-arrow-up"></i>
  </button>
    <app-navfooter></app-navfooter>
  </div>
</div>

</html>

    cursor: pointer;
}

    color: rgb(245, 50, 50);
}


.dropProfile{
    border: none !important;
    border-radius: 0 !important;
    -webkit-box-shadow: none !important;
    box-shadow: none !important;
}

    max-height: 60px;
    height: auto;
}

    color: #ffffff;
    border-radius: 100%;
    background-color: $dark-blue;
    padding: 15px 20px;
    position: fixed;
    transition: all 300ms ease 0ms;
    box-shadow: 0px 8px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    z-index: 3;

            transform: translateY(-7px);
        }
    }
}
